mapper.select: SELECT seq FROM action_user WHERE passwd = #{passwd} AND locale = #{locale}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO action_session (user_seq, session_key, ua, ip) VALUES (#{user_seq}, #{session_key}, #{ua}, #{ip})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM action_session WHERE session_key = #{session_key} AND user_seq = #{user_seq}
SELECT seq FROM action_user WHERE locale=#{locale}
SELECT seq AS 'n', name AS 'name' FROM dfi_dic_food WHERE name LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword},'%')
SELECT A.seq As 'seq', A.name AS 'name' FROM (SELECT * FROM dfi_dic_food INNER JOIN (SELECT dfi.food_seq FROM dfi WHERE dfi.drug_seq=#{drug_seq}) AS B ON dfi_dic_food.seq=B.food_seq) AS A
SELECT seq AS 'n', name AS 'name' FROM dfi_dic_drug WHERE name LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword},'%')
SELECT A.seq AS 'seq', A.name AS 'name' FROM (SELECT * FROM dfi_dic_drug INNER JOIN (SELECT dfi.drug_seq FROM dfi WHERE dfi.food_seq=#{food_seq}) AS B ON dfi_dic_drug.seq=B.drug_seq) AS A

SELECT A.seq AS 'seq', A.pmid AS 'pmid', A.drug_seq AS 'drug_seq', A.food_seq AS 'food_seq', A.key_sents AS 'key_sents', A.foods AS 'foods', A.drugs AS 'drugs', A.evidence_level AS 'evidence_level', A.title AS 'title', A.abstractText AS 'abstract' FROM (SELECT B.seq, B.pmid, B.drug_seq, B.food_seq, B.key_sents, B.foods, B.drugs, B.evidence_level, dfi_paper.title, dfi_paper.abstract As abstractText FROM dfi_paper INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM dfi WHERE dfi.food_seq=#{food_seq} AND dfi.drug_seq=#{drug_seq}) AS B ON dfi_paper.pmid=B.pmid) AS A
SELECT drug_n as 'n' , name AS 'name' FROM ddi_drug WHERE name LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword},'%')
SELECT drug_n FROM ddi_drug WHERE seq=#{drugSeq}
SELECT * FROM ddi_pk WHERE prepetrator=#{pdrugNum} AND victim=#{vdrugNum}
SELECT name FROM ddi_drug WHERE drug_n=#{drugNum}
SELECT * FROM ddi.ddi_poly WHERE drug_n=#{pdrugNum} or drug_n=#{vdrugNum} ORDER BY protein ASC
SELECT atc FROM ddi_atc WHERE drug_n=#{drugNum}
SELECT drug_n FROM ddi_atc WHERE atc=#{atc}
